verses.verse: Then <S%H347>Job<s%> <S%H6030>answered<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%>,
I have <S%H8085>heard<s%> many such <S%H7227>things<s%>: <S%H5999>Miserable<s%> comforters are ye <S%H5162>all<s%>.
Shall <S%H7307>vain<s%> <S%H1697>words<s%> have an <S%H7093>end<s%>? Or what <S%H4834>provoketh<s%> thee that thou <S%H6030>answerest<s%>?

I also could <S%H1696>speak<s%> as ye <S%H3863>do<s%>; If your <S%H5315>soul<s%> <S%H3426>were<s%> in my <S%H5315>soul<s%>'s <S%H2266>stead<s%>, I could join <S%H4405>words<s%> together against <S%H5128>you<s%>, And shake my <S%H7218>head<s%> at <S%H1119>you<s%>.
But I would <S%H553>strengthen<s%> you <S%H1119>with<s%> my <S%H6310>mouth<s%>, And the <S%H5205>solace<s%> of my <S%H8193>lips<s%> would assuage your <S%H2820>grief<s%>.
Though I <S%H1696>speak<s%>, my <S%H3511>grief<s%> is not <S%H2820>assuaged<s%>; And though I <S%H2308>forbear<s%>, what am I <S%H1980>eased<s%>?
But now he hath made me <S%H3811>weary<s%>: Thou hast made <S%H8074>desolate<s%> all my <S%H5712>company<s%>.

And thou hast laid fast <S%H7059>hold<s%> on <S%H5707>me<s%>, which is a witness against <S%H3585>me<s%>: And my leanness riseth <S%H6965>up<s%> against <S%H6030>me<s%>, It testifieth to my <S%H6440>face<s%>.

He hath <S%H2963>torn<s%> me in his <S%H639>wrath<s%>, and <S%H7852>persecuted<s%> <S%H2786>me<s%>; He hath gnashed upon me with his <S%H8127>teeth<s%>: Mine <S%H6862>adversary<s%> <S%H3913>sharpeneth<s%> his eyes upon <S%H5869>me<s%>.

They have <S%H6473>gaped<s%> upon me with their <S%H6310>mouth<s%>; They have <S%H5221>smitten<s%> me upon the <S%H3895>cheek<s%> <S%H2781>reproachfully<s%>: They <S%H4390>gather<s%> themselves together against <S%H3162>me<s%>.
God <S%H410><s%> <S%H5462>delivereth<s%> me to the <S%H5760>ungodly<s%>, And casteth me <S%H3399>into<s%> the <S%H3027>hands<s%> of the <S%H7563>wicked<s%>.

I was at <S%H7961>ease<s%>, and he brake me <S%H6565>asunder<s%>; <S%H270>Yea<s%>, he hath taken me by the <S%H6203>neck<s%>, and dashed me to <S%H6327>pieces<s%>: He hath also set me <S%H6965>up<s%> for his <S%H4307>mark<s%>.

His <S%H7228>archers<s%> compass me round <S%H5437>about<s%>; He <S%H6398>cleaveth<s%> my <S%H3629>reins<s%> <S%H6398>asunder<s%>, and doth not <S%H2550>spare<s%>; He poureth <S%H8210>out<s%> my <S%H4845>gall<s%> upon the <S%H776>ground<s%>.
He <S%H6555>breaketh<s%> me with <S%H6556>breach<s%> <S%H6440>upon<s%> <S%H6556>breach<s%>; He <S%H7323>runneth<s%> upon me like a <S%H1368>giant<s%>.
I have <S%H8609>sewed<s%> <S%H8242>sackcloth<s%> upon my <S%H1539>skin<s%>, And have <S%H5953>laid<s%> my <S%H7161>horn<s%> in the <S%H6083>dust<s%>.
My <S%H6440>face<s%> is <S%H2560>red<s%> with <S%H1065>weeping<s%>, And on my <S%H6079>eyelids<s%> is the shadow of <S%H6757>death<s%>;
Although there is no <S%H2555>violence<s%> in my <S%H3709>hands<s%>, And my <S%H8605>prayer<s%> is <S%H2134>pure<s%>.
O <S%H776>earth<s%>, <S%H3680>cover<s%> not thou my <S%H1818>blood<s%>, And let my <S%H2201>cry<s%> have no <S%H4725>resting<s%> -place.
Even <S%H5707>now<s%>, behold, my witness is in <S%H8064>heaven<s%>, And he that <S%H7717>voucheth<s%> for me is on <S%H4791>high<s%>.
My <S%H7453>friends<s%> <S%H3887>scoff<s%> at <S%H5869>me<s%>: But mine eye poureth <S%H1811>out<s%> tears unto <S%H433>God<s%>,
That he would <S%H3198>maintain<s%> the right of a <S%H1397>man<s%> with <S%H433>God<s%>, And of a son of <S%H120>man<s%> with his <S%H1121>neighbor<s%>!
For when a <S%H4557>few<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> are <S%H857>come<s%>, I shall <S%H1980>go<s%> the <S%H734>way<s%> whence I shall not <S%H7725>return<s%>.
